ij.gui

Class Arrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • ij.gui.Roi
      • ij.gui.Line
        • ij.gui.Arrow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Arrow
extends Line
    This is an Roi subclass for creating and displaying arrows.
